properties.name: InternetGatewayId
properties.description: The ID of the internet gateway. You must specify either InternetGatewayId or VpnGatewayId, but not both.

type.description: The ID of the internet gateway. You must specify either InternetGatewayId or VpnGatewayId, but not both.

properties.name: VpnGatewayId
properties.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway. You must specify either InternetGatewayId or VpnGatewayId, but not both.

type.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway. You must specify either InternetGatewayId or VpnGatewayId, but not both.

properties.name: AttachmentType
properties.description: Used to identify if this resource is an Internet Gateway or Vpn Gateway Attachment

type.description: Used to identify if this resource is an Internet Gateway or Vpn Gateway Attachment
